welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hillsboro, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant art scene, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Portland Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
